results.title: Resolution of dynamic left ventricular outflow tract obstruction and reversible left ventricular hypertrophy in 4 cats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ was prescribed to all 4 @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@, and all remained on oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ through the final recheck.

results.title: Ventricular pre-excitation in cats: 17 cases.
results.text_hl: In two @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@, @DISEASE_Pre_Excitation_Syndromes @DISEASE_MESH:D011226 @@@VPE@@@ was an incidental finding. @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@Congestive heart failure@@@ was uncommon (3/17 @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@).

results.title: Comparative effectiveness of different beta-adrenergic antagonists on mortality among adults with heart failure in clinical practice.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Among 11 326 adults surviving a hospitalization for @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@, 7976 received beta-blockers (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, 38.5%; @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol tartrate@@@, 43.2%; @CHEMICAL_Carvedilol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077261 @@@carvedilol@@@, 11.6%; and other, 6.7%) during follow-up.

citations.NLM: Go AS, Yang J, Gurwitz JH, Hsu J, Lane K, Platt R. Comparative effectiveness of different beta-adrenergic antagonists on mortality among adults with heart failure in clinical practice. Arch Intern Med. 2008 Dec 8;168(22):2415-21. PMID: 19064823
citations.BibTeX: @article{19064823, title={Comparative effectiveness of different beta-adrenergic antagonists on mortality among adults with heart failure in clinical practice.}, author={Go AS and Yang J and Gurwitz JH and Hsu J and Lane K and Platt R}, journal={Arch Intern Med}, volume={168}, number={22}, pages={2415-21}}
